poem:
### Changing of the Guard

Theatre's breath shifts,  
echoes of past voices fade—  
Goold's spark moves south,  
an artist's dance into the Old Vic's arms.  
Names change, but the stage  
whispers the same stories,  
between shadows and footlights;  
new visions cast  
between silent drapes  
of history's patient theatre.
